summary: Four of my dearest characters now available for your travels!
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=3][i]Textures for all:
[/i][/size][size=3][i]SRG Textures by Seren 4XX
[/i][/size][size=3][i]OR
[/i][/size][size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]Pride of Valhalla[/url] diffuse maps (femalehead) with SRG normal maps (femalehead_msn).
[/i][/size][size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] for eyes.
[/i][/size][size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos Renewal[/url] for hair.
[/i][/size][size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] for eyebrows.
[/i][/size][size=3][i]and lastly, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?]Northborn Scars[/url] (for Cameron and Constance!).[/i][/size][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][size=3][i]
Requirements:
[/i][/size][size=3][i]SKSE
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Showracemenu Precache Killer (optional but highly reccomended if you experience crashes with hair mods etc).
[/i][/size][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][size=3][i]How to install:
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Drop the jslot files into your Skyrim folder, Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets.
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Then drop the sculpt files into your Skyrim folder, Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen.
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Open up RaceMenu, select the correct race for the preset you're using (Cameron - Redguard, Constance & Jessie - Nord, Jamie -  Imperial) and import the sculpt files, then load the preset.
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Done! Enjoy!

ENB used for screenshots:
Evok Cinematic ENB
Insomnia ENB

[/i][/size][size=3][i]Make sure to post your screenshots, I'd love to see them!
[/i][/size][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Credits:
[/i][/size][size=3][i]LogRaam for The Eyes of Beauty
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Seren4XX for SRG Textures
[/i][/size][size=3][i]dracofish for Pride of Valhalla Textures
[/i][/size][size=3][i]kaeper for Showracemenu Precache Killer
[/i][/size][size=3][i]expired for RaceMenu
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Ian Patterson, Stephen Abel and Paul Connelly for SKSE
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Hvergelmir for Brows
[/i][/size][size=3][i]Northborn for Northborn Scars
[/i][/size][size=3][i]And of course, Bethesda, for creating Skyrim![/i][/size][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][size=3][i]
Enjoy :) ~Brella[/i][/size][/center]
author: brella2002
